The video clip shared with the claim was: 2. A reverse image search was conducted using the frames from the video, using keywords related to Muslim protests, which led to the discovery of a Facebook post by 'Dunida Islaamka Media Islamic world media' with a Somali caption.
Further research and verification effort: which led to an article by German outlet NDR News published on January 11, 2020, discussing a demonstration in Hamburg against the suppression of the Uyghur ethnic group in China.
Protests against the treatment of Uighur: indicating that the video clip in question was not related to France declaring war on Muslims but rather a demonstration against the treatment of Uighur Muslims in China.
